title: Who wins this battle royal?
body:
If these champions all fought in an arena in a FFA who would be the last one standing?

1. Jax using the mercury hammer (Jayce's weapon).

2.  Annie as an adult.

3.  Lee Sin if he still practiced magic after his training as a monk.

4.  Braum after using Mundo's roids and Singed's insanity potion.

5.  Tryndamere just after holding Ashe in his arms as she took her last breath.

replies.body:
Jax uses his lamppost because he wants to give his opponents a chance, so if he had the Mercury Hammer, he would demolish the others.

Imagine if he had a real weapon.
Annie with 4-10 times the amount of practice and experience would be terrifying.
Tryndamere would just outlast them all. It wouldn't be that impressive since he'd get his health drained to 1% ASAP and then he'd just slowly swat them to death.
